dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach financial decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize stability and predictability, avoiding high-risk investments.
Your FarTwin will seek high returns with a willingness to take calculated risks.

dimensions.label: Intellectual Curiosity
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach new ideas and knowledge?

options.description: Your FarTwin will enthusiastically seek out new experiences, reading widely, and engaging in discussions.
Your FarTwin will be open to trying new things, but may not actively seek out new knowledge or ideas.

dimensions.label: Social Media Presence
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin manage their online presence?

options.description: Your FarTwin will regularly post updates, engage with followers, and maintain a strong online reputation.
Your FarTwin will limit their social media use, preferring to focus on personal relationships and offline activities.

dimensions.label: Collaboration Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin work with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will actively seek out opportunities to work with others, sharing ideas and expertise.
Your FarTwin will focus on individual achievements, potentially at the expense of team collaboration.

dimensions.label: Humor Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle humor and wit?

options.description: Your FarTwin will appreciate clever wordplay, irony, and sarcasm.
Your FarTwin will enjoy lighthearted humor, playful teasing, and silliness.

dimensions.label: Decluttering Habits
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach organizing their belongings?

options.description: Your FarTwin will carefully categorize and prioritize tasks, maintaining a tidy living space.
Your FarTwin will have an easy-going attitude towards clutter, finding ways to adapt to their environment.

dimensions.label: Ambition Level
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach personal and professional goals?

options.description: Your FarTwin will set ambitious targets, pursuing them with determination and focus.
Your FarTwin will prioritize stability over growth, taking a measured approach to achieving their goals.

dimensions.label: Creative Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin explore their artistic side?

options.description: Your FarTwin will seek out a wide range of creative outlets, experimenting with various mediums and styles.
Your FarTwin will focus on one artistic pursuit, developing expertise and building upon their skills.
